Title: Completely Remove The Usage of Chinese from Daily Work and Study Activities
Content:
These days I decided to have a complete removal for the usage of Chinese from my daily work and study activities.

And here’s why.

Efficiency.

Generally, we fetch information for working and learning from the Internet by search engines. Result sets from the search engine in Chinese have unacceptably poor quality. Therefore, it is efficient to search for information without using Chinese.

Further, working without Chinese makes me familiar with the words. Therefore I can organize keywords much quicker than before.

“Goods” and “Bads”.

The open-source world provides us with many solutions. But, eventually, you would find there somewhere the open-source still not covered.

Pay for them, or, crack them. That’s what I mean “goods” and “bads”.

No matter “goods” or “bads”, you will meet some problems in the Chinese network:

  • Banned due to the Chinese government’s order.
  • People turn to earn money even from the crack.
Author: Cybartist
